comment: That is a domestic cat. 'Norwegian Forest Cats' are nothing more than feral creatures. (And they're a plague on the natural habitat. Strap a collar with a bell on it around their necks.)
amr:

(m / multi-sentence

      :snt4 (s / stick-01

            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (c4 / collar
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-03
